StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDataSheetDischargeDetail]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgID int , @FiscalYear int
AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @StartDate DateTime DECLARE @EndDate DateTime
SET @StartDate = CAST( CONVERT(varchar(4), @FiscalYear-1) + '-10-1' as Date.me); SET @EndDate = CAST( CONVERT(varchar(4), @FiscalYear) + '-10-1' as Date.me);
SELECT p.LAST_NAME, p.FIRST_NAME, p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, cd.DISCH_REASON AS DISCHARGE_REASON, rp.RANK_CODE, (SELECT LAST_NAME + ', ' + FIRST_NAME FROM MCRISS.dbo.PERSON WHERE PERSON_ID = rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID) as recruiterName, cd.COMPONENT_CODE, cd.CONTRACT_ID AS ID, cd.DISCH_DATE, 'DEP DISCHARGE' AS DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, n.rowguid AS NwaId, (SELECT ProspectId FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect WHERE NwaId = n.rowguid) AS ProspectId FROM MCRISS_OLAP.dbo.CONTRACT_DISCHARGES cd INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT c ON c.CONTRACT_ID = cd.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Person p ON p.PERSON_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON rp ON n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID = rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID
WHERE (cd.DISCH_DATE >= @StartDate AND cd.DISCH_DATE < @EndDate) AND cd.RSS_ORG_ID = @OrgID
UNION
SELECT p.LAST_NAME, p.FIRST_NAME, p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, sd.DISCH_REASON AS DISCHARGE_REASON, rp.RANK_CODE, (SELECT LAST_NAME + ', ' + FIRST_NAME FROM MCRISS.dbo.PERSON WHERE PERSON_ID = rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID) as recruiterName, sd.COMPONENT_CODE, sd.SHIPPER_ID AS ID, sd.DISCH_DATE, 'MCRD DISCHARGE' AS DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, n.rowguid AS NwaId, (SELECT ProspectId FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect WHERE NwaId = n.rowguid) AS ProspectId FROM MCRISS_OLAP.dbo.SHIPPER_DISCHARGES sd INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Person p ON p.PERSON_ID = sd.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON n.Marine_Candidate_Id = p.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON rp ON n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID = rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID
WHERE (sd.DISCH_DATE >= @StartDate AND sd.DISCH_DATE < @EndDate) AND sd.RSS_ORG_ID = @OrgID
END
